_header: In Thee God Father I believe

Lam853.First Lines:
IN þee god fadir I bileeueÞe firste persoone ful of
                    myȝtÞat al of nouȝt hast maad to meeueBoþe heuen
                    & erþe day & nyȝt…
Lam853.Last Lines:
…ffor al fleische schal ryse þat deeþ hath
                    slaynÞe holigoost schal ȝeue alsoEuerlastynge lyf to all
                    true menÞat we may heere serue þertoY rede we seie alle.
                    amen
Lam853.Attributed Title: Credo in deum patrem omnipotentem (p. 39, rubric)
Lam853.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The History of the Holy Grail by Henry Lovelich.
EETS
         e.s. 20, 24, 28, 30, 95 (1874-8); repr. in 2 vols, 1973: 2.101-3.
